meanings.definition: The behavior or attitudes of a snob.
meanings.sent1: Her snobberies were evident in the way she looked down on others.
meanings.sent2: His snobberies made it difficult for him to make friends.
meanings.sent3: Despite her snobberies, she was still invited to the party.
meanings.sent4: His snobberies were like a thick fog, isolating him from those around him.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the stifling air of her snobberies.

meanings.definition: The act of behaving in a snobbish manner.
meanings.sent1: He engaged in snobberies by refusing to associate with anyone he deemed unworthy.
meanings.sent2: Her snobberies were off-putting to those who just wanted to have a good time.
meanings.sent3: His snobberies were so extreme that even the snails in the garden avoided him.
meanings.sent4: The snobberies of the elite were like a barrier, keeping others at a distance.
meanings.sent5: The snobberies of the group were like a dark cloud hanging over the event.
